\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{array}
\usepackage{tabularx}
\usepackage{adjustbox}

\newcounter{verscount}
\setcounter{verscount}{0}
\newcommand{\addversione}[6][]{
	\ifdefined\setversione
		\setversione{#2}
	\else\fi
	\stepcounter{verscount}
	\expandafter\newcommand%
		\csname ver\theverscount \endcsname{#2&#3&#4&#1&#5&#6}
}

\newcommand{\listversioni}{
	\ifnum\value{verscount}>1
		\csname ver\theverscount \endcsname
		\addtocounter{verscount}{-1}
		\\\hline
		\listversioni
	\else
		\csname ver\theverscount \endcsname\\\hline
	\fi
}

\newcommand{\makeversioni}{
	\begin{adjustbox}{minipage=\paperwidth-1cm, center}
		\begin{tabularx}{\textwidth}{|c|c|c|c|c|X|}
		\hline
		\textbf{Versione} & \textbf{Data} & \textbf{Persona} & \textbf{Verificatore} & \textbf{Attivit√†} & \textbf{Descrizione} \\
		\hline
		\listversioni
		\end{tabularx}
	\end{adjustbox}
	\clearpage
}
